member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.DataService.GetPdf``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns an entity as pdf bytes.
member.param: Entity to be returned as pdf bytes (entities of type Sales Receipt, Invoice and Estimate are supported to be returned as pdf).
member.returns: Returns pdf as bytes

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.DataService.SendEmail``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Call the synchronous methods to send entity of type T in an email.
member.param: Instance of entity to be sent in an email. This is not the actual entity that will be emailed. This entity needs to be present on server and the entity on the server will be sent in an email.Any changes in the passed in entity must be committed to the server in order for it to reflect in the email. Entities of type Sales Receipt, Invoice and Estimate are supported to be sent in an email as pdf
Optional parameter to specify an email address
member.returns: Retruns the entity sent in email

member.summary: Returns entities by the Level specified, supported for TaxClassification only.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Intuit.Ipp.DataService has public methods to call Intuit Data Services and The assembly has methods for all CRUD (Add, Update, FindById, FindAll and Delete) operations and also has features to query QBO entities.

member.name: T:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService
member.summary: This interface specifies the Sync CRUD operations for IDS.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.Add``1(``0)
member.summary: Adds an entity under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context.
member.returns: Returns an updated version of the entity with updated identifier and sync token.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.Delete``1(``0)
member.summary: Deletes an entity under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.Void``1(``0)
member.summary: Voids an entity under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.Update``1(``0)
member.summary: Updates an entity under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context.
member.returns: Returns an updated version of the entity with updated identifier and sync token.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.FindById``1(``0)
member.summary: Gets an entity under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context.
member.returns: Returns an entity of specified Id.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.FindByParentId``1(``0)
member.summary: Gets a list of all TacClassification entities specified by ParentId under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context
member.returns: Returns the list of entities.

member.name: M:Intuit.Ipp.DataService.IDataService.FindByLevel``1(``0)
member.summary: Gets a list of all TaxClassification entities specified by Level under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context
member.returns: Returns the list of entities.

members.member:
Gets a list of all entities of type T under the specified realm. The realm must be set in the context
Generic Type T. The entity for which the data is required. The Page number to retrieve. The number of record fetch in one call. Max size supported by QBO is 1000. Returns the list of entities."
